title: Ticket #4149: Revamp testing infrastructure personal condor status/state
description:
CondorPersonal::IsRunningYet leads to tests failing since we fail to correctly either start a personal condor or correctly know that it started. We are implementing a new method and opting only a single test in as we bring this method up.

Large blacks of comments can be seen before "pacakge: package WhoDataInstance" in CondorTest.pm and at the beginning of CondorPersonal.
